October 19

Update: OWH Ver1.83→Ver1.84 & OWH+ Ver1.17→Ver1.18

（日本語下）

------EN------
- [OWH/OWH+] Bug fix: "File Read Error" occurs when the save data from OWH: ver1.82(or older) or OWH+: ver1.16(or older) is loaded.

- [OWH+ only for EN] Bug fix: Once the player hits the end of the world more than the second time, the option to ask "if the player wants to explore more 1000km" did not appear.

------JP------
-【OWH+ 英語版のみ】世界の果てに2回目以降に到達したとき、
　　　　　　　追加の1000kmを目指す選択肢が出なくなっていたバグを修正

-【OWH/OWH+】OWHのVer1.82以前、またはOWH+のVer1.16以前で
　　　　　　　セーブしたデータをロードすると、ロード直後に
　　　　　　　ファイル読み込みエラーが発生するバグを修正

October 18

Update: OWH Ver1.82→Ver1.83　&　OWH+ Ver1.16→Ver1.17

（日本語下）

------EN------
- [OWH/OWH+] Bug fix: The sound for opening the menu was wrong.

- [OWH+] Bug fix: Weapon durability decreases if you equip the short-ranged weapon and shoot the "Bomb Arrow".

- [OWH/OWH+ only for EN] File name fix: Some files showed an error upon execution for some users due to the files having a Japanese name, so all the file names have been changed to using the alphabet.

------JP------
●[OWH/OWH+]メニューを開いたときの音が想定と異なっていたバグを修正

●[OWH+]近接武器を装備しているにも関わらず、
　　　「爆弾矢（Bomb Arrow）」を当てると武器の耐久度が減ってしまうバグを修正

●[OWH/OWH+ 英語版のみ]
　一部環境で日本語を含むファイルが読み込みエラーを起こしたため、
　ファイル名を全てアルファベットに修正しました。

One Way Heroics Plus

READ MORE

About This Game

Across all dimensions, the only constant is Darkness! A procedurally generated RPG-roguelike journey across the multiverse!

In One Way Heroics, you take on the role of an intrepid adventurer who must travel across the land and face the Demon Lord before a mysterious darkness engulfs everything.

Darkness always approaches from the left, and with each movement, attack and action you take, the darkness creeps ever closer. Forced to run right, you'll encounter any number of monsters, allies, thieves and shops on your desperate journey to stop the end of everything.

The good news is that you don't just have access to one world. You have access to all of them. Born with the mysterious power to travel to other dimensions, you can choose which dimension you wish to travel to in order to get to the Demon Lord.

Dimensions vary based on their name. One might be full of lush forest landscapes full of adorable animals and cunning thieves, while another might be full of corrupted hellscapes infested with demons. You might find likeminded heroes willing to journey with you, or you might meet no one and be forced to venture into the unknown alone.

Like a dimension you previously visited? Simply input the name at the Dimensional selection screen before you begin your journey. Want to try your luck with a random dimension? Type any word that pops into your head, and watch as One Way Heroics builds you a world based on the name you chose.

Infinite permutations. Infinite worlds. Infinite adventure.

*This game supports Cloud Saves for most system data including clear data and unlockables, however mid-game saves do not carry over.
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1
    • Processor: Pentium III 1.0 GHz or better
    • Memory: 256 MB RAM
    • Graphics: 800x600 resolution or higher
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
READ MORE

Licensed by Smoking WOLF. Licensed to and published by Active Gaming Media Inc.

79 of 100 people (79%) found this review helpful
Maximum Player
1,059 products in account
73 reviews
Recommended
3.1 hrs on record
Posted: June 29
It's like a mix of old final fantasy games and a little bit of half minute hero. There is limited time to be in one place, because the darkness is moving from the left side. It's funny because you need to slowly move to the right. There are many perks to unlock, new classes and other things. Gameplay is not that bad and the further you get the more exciting it is. The worlds are random generated so don't need to worry if you forget where have you been last time. This game is good for one or two shots from time to time otherwise it may be boring.

「Rinzie」
40 products in account
4 reviews
Recommended
22.0 hrs on record
Posted: July 1
I use Zenura Weave, sacrificing my clothing for power.
I go into a town and people judged me, the one that's saving them all, for not wearing anything.
I run into the Demon Lord, who is a lonely reject hellbent on killing everyone in the world.
Since we both weren't accepted, we ultimately joined forces and ran across the entire world together, allowing everyone of those townsfolk to suffer from the darkness.

All in all, this game is a beautiful story about discrimination, friendship, streaking, punching cute animals, and acceptance.

★[T.I.]★ Zexion
148 products in account
22 reviews
Recommended
17.5 hrs on record
Posted: June 19
I bought One Way Heroics due to the plethora of positive reviews I saw...and because it was .69 cents in the steam summer sale. ;D However, I must say it has been the BEST .69 cents I have ever spent. I have put in over 10 hours of addictive gameplay, wondrous music, and hilarious and/or close-call moments in less than a week; all of which is wrapped up into one simple--but nothing less than amazing--game.

I can not emphasize enough how much I recommend that others get this game. It is not difficult to play, but can be hard to master, especially on harder difficulties. Finally, it is user-friendly and truly allows the player to challenge themselves or take it easy (whatever they feel like at the time they play). Great for all ages as long as they like the genres and style of gameplay this game has to offer.

Recommended
10.1 hrs on record
Posted: August 6
This game is a really entertaining japanese roguelike RPG. I played it only 9 hours till now, but I already love this game! Here are PROS and CONS:

+ extremely good price for such a game!
+ good combat system
+ great idea with a darkness coming behind you
+ randomly generated worlds
+ well-developed characters, items and in-game balance
+ lovely graphics <3
+ you can own a pet in this game!

- pet is not invulnerable :(
- Phantom Knights may come in an inappropriate moment :D
- no co-op :(

I rate 8/10 (pls make co-op).
